price: Wọn yóò máa gba n̄ǹkan tí Olúwa wọn bá fún wọn. Dájúdájú wọ́n ti jẹ́ olùṣe-rere ṣíwájú ìyẹn.
arabic: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَبۡلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ākhidhīna mā ātāhum rabbuhum innahum kānū qabla dhālika muḥ'sinīna
